character.name: Alex Pathfinder
character.tagline: Full-stack explorer crafting delightful web realms

milestones.title: Spawn Point: Bootcamp Commons
milestones.summary: Graduated from an immersive program and mapped the fundamentals of the web.
milestones.description: Alex unlocked the starter toolkit: semantic HTML, modern CSS, and a fearless curiosity for solving real-world problems.

quests.name: Bootcamp Capstone
quests.objective: Design and build a responsive travel planner UI in three weeks.
quests.outcome: Delivered a polished SPA that earned top marks for usability.

milestones.title: First Dungeon: Support Keep
milestones.summary: Joined a SaaS support guild to triage bugs and polish the UI.
milestones.description: Alex patrolled ticket queues, squashed UI gremlins, and learned how customer empathy sharpens design decisions.

quests.name: Response Time Charter
quests.objective: Reduce median ticket resolution time by 20% over a quarter.
quests.outcome: Automated debugging playbooks and cut response time by 28%.

quests.name: Bug Bash Blitz
quests.objective: Coordinate a cross-team defect triage event.
quests.outcome: Shipped 35 fixes in two days and stabilized a critical release.

milestones.title: Guild Promotion: Platform City
milestones.summary: Transitioned into a platform engineering squad to architect shared tooling.
milestones.description: Alex forged component libraries, hardened CI pipelines, and mentored newcomers through the labyrinth of services.

quests.name: Component Codex
quests.objective: Ship an accessible UI kit consumed by three product teams.
quests.outcome: Launched a themeable design system adopted across the org.

quests.name: Deployment Relay
quests.objective: Automate regression tests for nightly releases.
quests.outcome: Stabilized releases and trimmed manual QA by 60%.

milestones.title: Expedition: Data Frontier
milestones.summary: Ventured into data-heavy workflows to unlock analytics quests.
milestones.description: By partnering with analysts, Alex modeled pipelines, tuned dashboards, and brought clarity to metrics.

quests.name: Signal Beacon
quests.objective: Replace static KPI decks with live dashboards.
quests.outcome: Delivered interactive analytics that cut reporting prep time in half.

milestones.title: Current Campaign: Experience Overworld
milestones.summary: Leads cross-functional parties to craft accessible, story-driven products.
milestones.description: Alex now guides squads through the overworld—aligning discovery, prototyping, and delivery so every release feels heroic.

quests.name: Guided Onboarding
quests.objective: Design a progressive onboarding journey for a complex B2B tool.
quests.outcome: Increased trial conversion by 18% with narrative tutorials.

quests.name: Accessibility Crusade
quests.objective: Achieve WCAG 2.2 AA compliance across flagship flows.
quests.outcome: Rolled out shared a11y checks and improved usability scores by 25%.
